Reviews.Title: Very good camera.
Reviews.Author: Phillip Wulf
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera. We haven't figured everything out yet as to what it can do but, I'm sure we will. Takes very good pictures though and am Happy with it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Canon PowerShot ELPH 130 IS 16.0MP Wi-Fi Digital Camera - Red
8GB  Memory Card - Multi Card Reader/Writer
Digital Camera Case Black
Flexible Tripod, Memory Card Wallet, 3pc Cleaning Kit & 3 Screen Protectors
Micro Fiber Cleaning Cloth
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 130 IS 16.0MP Wi-Fi Digital Camera - Red + 8GB Memory Card + Card Reader/Writer + Digital Camera Case Black + Accessory Kit
